config.gloom_mod.lastHitDamage: Damage that will be dealt on 1 hp(half heart)
config.gloom_mod.damageInterval: Time interval between hits in minecraft ticks(20 is one second)
config.gloom_mod.lightLevel: threshold of light level after which you will start to take damage
config.gloom_mod.dimensions: Safe dimensions where youdont get attacked by gloom
